about.description_1: Networking Toolbox is an open-source collection of web-based networking tools designed to make network-related tasks quicker and easier.
about.description_2: With 100+ tools, it's privacy-focused and self-hostable, fully customizable, and includes a free REST API for automation.
about.sponsor_text: Consider sponsoring us on GitHub to support ongoing development!
